Package com.samysadi.acs.virtualization

This package contains definitions for virtualization entities of the simulator.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PuAllocator
    This interface defines the strategy to use when a new ComputingOperation is being activated in order to select a ProcessingUnit among all available ones inside the VM.
    TemporaryVirtualMachine
    Defines a virtual machine which is for temporary usage only.
    VirtualMachine
    A VirtualMachine is a RunnableEntity that can have multiple jobs running inside of it.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PuAllocatorDefault
    The strategy employed is to choose the ProcessingUnit that gives a higher promise (ie: the less used PU).
    TemporaryVirtualMachineDefault  
    VirtualMachineDefault
    This implementation will only set parent for its VirtualRam when it is started.

Package com.samysadi.acs.virtualization Description

This package contains definitions for virtualization entities of the simulator.
Since:
1.0
